grid.css: background-image: linear-gradient({{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px), linear-gradient(to right, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

crossDots.css: background-image: radial-gradient({{color1}} {{dotSize}}px, transparent {{dotSize}}px), radial-gradient({{color1}} {{dotSize}}px, transparent {{dotSize}}px); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-position: 0 0, {{halfSize}}px {{halfSize}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

vertical.css: background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(to right, {{color1}}, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{size}}px); background-color: {{color2}};

hexagons.css: background-image: linear-gradient(60deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, {{color1}} 75%, {{color1}}), linear-gradient(-60deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, {{color1}} 75%, {{color1}}); background-size: {{size}}px {{sqrtSize}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

weave.css: background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, {{color1}} 12%, transparent 0, transparent 88%, {{color1}} 0), linear-gradient(135deg, transparent 37%, {{color2}} 0, {{color2}} 63%, transparent 0), linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 37%, {{color1}} 0, {{color1}} 63%, transparent 0); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px;

zigzag.css: background-image: linear-gradient(135deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%) -{{halfSize}}px 0, linear-gradient(225deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%) -{{halfSize}}px 0, linear-gradient(315deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: {{size}}px {{halfSize}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

crosses.css: background-image: linear-gradient(to right, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px) calc({{size}}/2) calc({{size}}/2), linear-gradient(to bottom, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px) calc({{size}}/2) calc({{size}}/2); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color2}}; background-position: 0 0;

blobbyMesh.css: background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 0% 50%, {{color2}} {{halfSize}}px, {{color1}} {{halfSize}}px, {{color1}} {{size}}px, transparent {{size}}px), radial-gradient(circle at 100% 50%, {{color2}} {{halfSize}}px, {{color1}} {{halfSize}}px, {{color1}} {{size}}px, transparent {{size}}px); background-size: {{doubleSize}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

leafyPattern.css: background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 59%, {{color2}} 3%, {{color1}} 4%, {{color1}} 6%, transparent 7%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 41%, {{color1}} 3%, {{color2}} 4%, {{color2}} 6%, transparent 7%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 59%, {{color2}} 3%, {{color1}} 4%, {{color1}} 6%, transparent 7%), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 41%, {{color1}} 3%, {{color2}} 4%, {{color2}} 6%, transparent 7%), radial-gradient(circle at 25% 59%, {{color2}} 3%, {{color1}} 4%, {{color1}} 6%, transparent 7%), radial-gradient(circle at 75% 41%, {{color1}} 3%, {{color2}} 4%, {{color2}} 6%, transparent 7%); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

pixelatedNoise.css: background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox="0 0 100 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"%3E%3Cfilter id="noiseFilter"%3E%3CfeTurbulence type="fractalNoise" baseFrequency="0.65" numOctaves="3" stitchTiles="stitch"/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width="100%" height="100%" filter="url(%23noiseFilter)"%3E%3C/rect%3E%3C/svg%3E'); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color1}}; opacity: 0.5;

nestedSquares.css: background-image: linear-gradient(135deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%) -{{halfSize}}px 0, linear-gradient(225deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%) -{{halfSize}}px 0, linear-gradient(315deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%), linear-gradient(45deg, {{color1}} 25%, transparent 25%); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-color: {{color2}};

circuitBoard.css: background-color: {{color2}}; background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, {{color1}} 12%, transparent 0, transparent 88%, {{color1}} 0), linear-gradient(-45deg, {{color1}} 12%, transparent 0, transparent 88%, {{color1}} 0), linear-gradient(90deg, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent 0), linear-gradient(0deg, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent 0), radial-gradient(circle at 50% 50%, {{color1}} {{lineWidth}}px, transparent {{lineWidth}}px); background-size: {{size}}px {{size}}px, {{size}}px {{size}}px, {{size}}px {{size}}px, {{size}}px {{size}}px, {{size}}px {{size}}px; background-position: 0 0, 0 0, -{{halfSize}}px 0, 0 -{{halfSize}}px, 0 0;
